obstacles.name: Subway
obstacles.desc: Choose the type of the train

obstacles.name: Potion
obstacles.desc: Reset normal skill cooltimes, reduce ultimate cooltime by 50%

obstacles.name: Magic castle
obstacles.desc: Skill range x3,+30 damage for skill/basicattack

obstacles.name: Snatcher
obstacles.desc: Other players take 10% each of your money

obstacles.name: Vampire
obstacles.desc: Other players take away 20 HP each

obstacles.name: Summon
obstacles.desc: Summon every player in range of 20

obstacles.name: God`s hand
obstacles.desc: Force move one player in range of 5

obstacles.name: Kidnapper
obstacles.desc: choose between -300 HP and stun for 2 turns

obstacles.name: Slavery
obstacles.desc: -80HP for every turn, dies if you reach the end

obstacles.name: Jail
obstacles.desc: speed effect after stun for 3 turns

obstacles.name: Squid
obstacles.desc: Can`t use basic attack for 1 turn

obstacles.name: Dive
obstacles.desc: Ignore every attack and obstacle for 1 turn

obstacles.name: Lightning
obstacles.desc: HP -75 for every player in range of 3

obstacles.name: Tsunami
obstacles.desc: Every player move back by 3, HP -30

obstacles.name: Blue hole
obstacles.desc: Summon every player in range of 20

obstacles.name: Storm
obstacles.desc: Randomly move to a square in range of 5

obstacles.name: Tornado
obstacles.desc: move to random player in range of 30

obstacles.name: Volcano
obstacles.desc: HP - 1/4 of max HP, ignite effct for 3 turn

obstacles.name: Private loan
obstacles.desc: Can`t earn money, can`t sell tokens for 2 turns

obstacles.name: scam
obstacles.desc: take away half of your money and tokens

obstacles.name: Street vendor
obstacles.desc: can use store with 10% higher price

obstacles.name: Lottery
obstacles.desc: get huge amount of money by 7%

obstacles.name: Tax collector
obstacles.desc: take away 5% + 2$ x coins for every player

obstacles.name: Thief
obstacles.desc: take away one of your common items

obstacles.name: Curse
obstacles.desc: get worst result for next dice for 2 turns

obstacles.name: Grief
obstacles.desc: damage by 50% of your money you have

obstacles.name: Tollgate
obstacles.desc: can pass only if you have more than 150$ or 10 tokens
